project.name: Standardize Site Configuration
project.description: Create consistent configuration across all tracked sites. Currently each site has ad-hoc settings scattered across Worker environment and D1 database. Standardize into a unified configuration system.

stories.title: Create sites configuration table
stories.description: Add a D1 table to store per-site configuration with sensible defaults.
acceptance_criteria: sites table with id, domain, display_name, timezone, created_at
site_settings table for key-value overrides
Default timezone is America/New_York
Migration script populates existing sites
Worker reads site config from D1 (cached)
Invalid sites rejected based on table, not hardcoded list

schema.sites: id, domain, display_name, timezone, passkey_hash, is_active, created_at

stories.title: Per-site dashboard display names
stories.description: Allow friendly display names for each site in the dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows display_name instead of domain
Site dropdown uses display_name
API still uses domain as identifier
Display names editable via dashboard settings

stories.title: Per-site timezone support
stories.description: Display times in each site's configured timezone.
acceptance_criteria: Daily stats aggregated in site's timezone
Dashboard charts show site's local time
Worker converts UTC to site timezone for aggregation
Date picker respects site timezone
Timezone dropdown in settings

stories.title: Site-specific passkey management
stories.description: Move passkeys to site config table with proper hashing.
acceptance_criteria: Passkey stored per-site in sites.passkey_hash
Global passkey deprecated with migration path
New passkeys must be 16+ characters
Passkey change requires current passkey
Integrates with sec-3 (passkey hashing)

manual_tests: Dashboard shows correct display name for each site
Can change passkey for individual site
